item.title: Community - From the Inside Out
item.description:
Description

I came for the language, but I stayed for the Community --Brett Cannon, Pycon 2014 Why? What draws us to community? What makes a great Community? How do we contribute? I'll share some insights, some science, and some surprisingly broad principles. I'll share what contributes, what parts are similar to coding practices, and some ways you can contribute to a great Community feeling.
item.dc:creator: Yarko Tymciurak
